item.title: DARCLIFE
item.description: DARCLIFE (Deep subsurface Archaea: carbon cycle, life strategies, and role in sedimentary ecosystems) project was on its last year when I enrolled to be a PhD student end of 2015.

item.title: Secondary production in marine sediments
item.description: Secondary production in sediments may have been underestimated before. This process dominated by bacterial activities plays an pivotal role in reshaping the organic matter composition after sedimentation.

item.title: The Ocean Floor - Earth’s Uncharted Interface
